DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to determine if sending reminder text messages helps patients take their Oral Anticancer Medication (OAMs) when they are supposed to.
DOC.brief_title: Using a Patient-Centered mHealth Intervention to Improve Adherence to Oral Anticancer Medications
DOC.criteria: Patient in the Sarcoma, Solid Tumor Gastrointestinal (ST GI), and Thoracic Medicine service at MSK. Starting a new treatment regimen that includes a single oral anticancer medication Patients must have a mobile phone that can send and receive SMS/MMS messages and is internetenabled. Age 18 or older. Ability to speak and read English because we do not have the resources to translate the text messages into other languages. Patient expresses inability or unfamiliarity with using SMS/MMS messaging on their phone and is unwilling to be trained in the use of this technology.
